dataset.title: Phytoplankton cell abundance of Lake Cedrino and Temo (SI001231 Sardinian Lake Ecosystems) in 2012

section.para: This dataset includes phytoplankton abundance data taken in two research sites (Lake Cedrino and Temo) of the site Sardinian Lake Ecosystems as part of LTER Italy. Samples were collected as representative of each season during 2012. Data comprise measurements in the water column ad different depth from surface to the bottom.

section.title: Dataset access and use constraints
section.para: Principal:EnvEurope (LTER-Europe) has granted a permission of type:Restricted access detaily defined in intellectual property information
Co-authorship on publications resulting from use of the dataset

online.onlineDescription: ftp-repository at the Environment Agency Austria/Umweltbundesamt

para.literalLayout: Phytoplankton samples (100 ml) were fixed in Lugol’s solution and analyzed with Utermöhl’s technique (1958). Cell density was valuated analyzing subsamples of 5-10 ml of the fixed samples with an inverted microscope (Zeiss, Axiovert 10) at 200x and 400x magnifications in an adequate number of fields. Species were determined using traditional phycological determination manuals

section.para: Samples were collected at different depth (surface, 1, 2.5, 5, 7.5, 10 and sometimes at 15 m depth) with a Niskin bottle and placed in a dark cooler box and packed in ice at the time of collection
